name: Path T Merkel Cell Skin
title: Pathologic T
notes:
**Note 1:** Code the tumor with the greatest extension when there are multiple simultaneous tumors.

**Note 2:**  Skin ulceration does not alter the T category.

**Note 3:**  In-transit metastasis is coded in N (regional lymph nodes).

**Note 4:** Tumor size must be known to assign a value of T1, T2 or T3. You may use a physician’s statement of the T category if this is the only information in the medical record.
* If the tumor appears to be in the T1, T2 or T3 categories, but no size or category is specified, assign TX

**Note 5:** For the following descriptions, assign the appropriate T category (T1, T2 or T3) based on the tumor size.

    Lesion(s) confirmed to dermis
    Localized, NOS
    Subcutaneous tissue (through entire dermis)
